title: Ciabatta
ingredients: ['For the starter', '1/8 teaspoon dried active baking yeast', '2 tablespoons warm water (45 C)', '5 tablespoons warm water', '150g (5 oz) bread flour', 'For the bread', '1/2 teaspoon dried active baking yeast', '2 tablespoons warm milk (45 C)', '150ml (5 fl oz) warm water', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '275g (10 oz) bread flour', '1 1/2 teaspoons salt']
